text: Malir is a town in Karachi, Pakistan Malir may also refer to; *Malir District, an administrative unit of Sindh, Pakistan *Malir River, a river in Pakistan *Malir Cantonment, a cantonment in Pakistan *Malir River Bridge, a bridge in Pakistan *Malir railway station, a railway station in Pakistan *Malir Development Authority, a development authority of Malir District ==See also== * *
title: Malir (disambiguation)
